channel.title: Little help please
channel.description:
Hey, as I'm finally starting to get everything figured out ( mostly because i've ran into every problem possible ). I've run into yet another. I've googled it and searched it on here. Basically My compression tool has been working up until tonight. Now when I try to compress, compile, run, decompress.. ect...
I am getting....
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: DefCompressor Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: DefCompressor at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:320) Could not find the main class: DefCompressor. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
I've been having some issues with the enviromental variables, maby this is a result. Been trying to get ant as a path aswell as java at the same time.

item.title: Little help please
item.dc:creator: @remenissions remenissions
item.description:
@remenissions wrote:

Hey, as I’m finally starting to get everything figured out ( mostly because i’ve ran into every problem possible ). I’ve run into yet another. I’ve googled it and searched it on here. Basically My compression tool has been working up until tonight. Now when I try to compress, compile, run, decompress… ect…

I am getting…

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: DefCompressor
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: DefCompressor
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:320)
Could not find the main class: DefCompressor. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

I’ve been having some issues with the enviromental variables, maby this is a result. Been trying to get ant as a path aswell as java at the same time.

Read full topic
